document.full_text: apple's ipad 2 shortage has spread to the afterlife as chinese families in malaysia rush to buy paper replicas of the popular new gadget to burn for their dead as part of a centuries-old rite.
document.title: ipad 2 sold out in the afterlife as chinese pray for the dead
lines_and_colors: apple's ipad 2 shortage has spread to the afterlife as chinese families in malaysia rush to buy paper replicas of the popular new gadget to burn for their dead as part of a centuries-old rite.
